description.narrative: Strengthened capacity of the Ministry of Health and municipalities to allocate adequate budget and to adopt and implement the WASH policy to ensure the appropriate water and sanitation conditions at household level.

sector.narrative: Provision of multiple-levels (or alternative pathways of education) teacher training
System strengthening - inclusive education for children with disabilities
Water - climate resilience and environmental sustainability

title.narrative: UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strengthened capacity of the Ministry of Health and municipalities to allocate adequate budget and to adopt and implement the WASH policy to ensure the appropriate water and sanitation conditions at household level.
% of schools in rural areas that have improved their water and sanitation services
% of children, adolescents and women who know and practice hygiene measures
% of mothers and fathers who know and apply appropriate hand wash techniques
